TopicTitle: Space Craft and the Craft of Understanding Comets

Articles.Content: I created a blog about Space Craft. https://www.fastaviationdata.com/blog.php?id=5&&title?Space%20Craft%20and%20the%20Craft%20of%20Understanding%20Comets

This ought to be a blog post on your profile, rather than a thread in the Spacecraft Exchange, or a post in one of the chat threads in the Science Labs or Space Lounge Forums.

This forums is meant for sharing or discussing craft designs within KSP.
Comets, huh? I've got my name on the microchip of the Stardust probe, which collected samples from a comet.
